pageContext.description:
This little panel shows the Virgin nursing the infant Christ against the backdrop of a curtain held up by three cherubs. The ox and ass can be seen to the left together with the manger. 
[cda 2021]
pageContext.dimensions:
Dimensions of support: 17 x 13.5 cm
[Lostart online database, accessed 03.03.2021](http://www.lostart.de/DE/Verlust/257777)
pageContext.medium:

metadata.title: The Virgin Nursing the Child

pageContext.provenance:
- until 1911 in the private collection of F. Ricard, Frankfurt am Main
- Gifted to the Staatliche Museen, Gemäldegalerie, inv. no. 614 A
- from 1937 on loan to the German Embassy in London
- since 1945 missing 
[Lostart online database, accessed 03.03.2021](http://www.lostart.de/DE/Verlust/257777)
pageContext.signature: Artist's insignia at the right side: 'Augustus Corvus // faciebat // 1558'
